QuestData.Title: Allies in Dalaran
QuestData.Description: Welcome to Northrend, $n. I have been asked to arrange travel for you to Dalaran so that you can meet with our allies there.$B$BRide the gryphon to Dalaran and once you land, make your way to our inn there, A Hero's Welcome. Find Isirami Fairwind and speak with her immediately.$B$BShe can help you bind your hearthstone to the city so you can use the Silver Enclave's portal to travel back to Stormwind quickly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accept a gryphon ride to Dalaran and speak with Isirami Fairwind at A Hero's Welcome.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Dalaran! This inn is part of the Silver Enclave, the headquarters of the official Alliance presence in our city.$B$BDon't forget to bind your hearthstone here for easy travel to the city and access to the portal to Stormwind next door.
